sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { CheckIcon } from "@heroicons/react/20/solid"; import './Pricing.scss' const tiers = [ { name: "Monthly", id: "tier-freelancer", href: "#", priceMonthly: "₼ 30", description: "Perfect for the adventurous city explorer looking for a flexible and short-term mode of transport.", features: [ "1 hour free every day", "Additional 15 min is 80 cents", "15 minutes Bonus", "No commitment", "Quick start", ], mostPopular: false, }, { name: "Seasonal", id: "tier-startup", href: "#", priceMonthly: "₼ 26", description: "Tailored for the seasonal rider seeking a convenient mode of transport for a few months.", features: [ "1 hour free every day", "Additional 15 min is 65 cents", "25 minutes Bonus", "Better value for money.", "Great for seasonal riders", ], mostPopular: true, }, { name: "Annual", id: "tier-enterprise", href: "#", priceMonthly: "₼ 25", description: "For committed urban commuter looking for a sustainable and economical transportation solution all year round.", features: [ "1 hour free every day", "Additional 15 min is 50 cents", "35 minutes Bonus", "Reliable year-round transport", "Maximum savings", ], mostPopular: false, }, ]; function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(" "); } export default function Example() { return (

Pricing

Pricing plans for your preferences

{tiers.map((tier, tierIdx) => (

{tier.name}

{tier.mostPopular ? (

Most popular

) : null}

{tier.description}

{tier.priceMonthly} /month

    {tier.features.map((feature) => (
  • {feature}
    • ))}
Buy plan
))}
); }
